text: @JStein_WaPo Americans can’t pay rent or buy food n u fools think they r going go spent on entertainment n buy hotdogs. @realDonaldTrump @GOP r out of touch about America ppl. Living Month to month Entertainment will tank cause no one wil go out Control covid19
